name: Wrong SOUL
description:
Fight a powerful assortment of creatures, make decisions that impact your abilities, and struggle to end the fantasy.

This game is heavily inspired by Deltarune (and Undertale by extension I suppose, but more so Deltarune, with the power meter).

It was originally going to be one boss fight, and partially because of this (and partially because of my lack of programming skills) the game is an absolute mess of spaghetti code.

Please let me know of any bugs, I'm sure there are many (also why there is a version number)!

Also, in the update number, first digit will probably always be 1, unless I make a sequel, the second is if I make balance updates, and third is me fixing bugs.

Also also: game made in Godot, art in Aseprite, music in Fl Studio Mobile.
